						education_masses_law = basic_religious_education
						administrative_system = feudal_administration
						cultural_traditions_law = martial_society
						marriage_law = monogamous_marriage
						heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
						legal_code_law = russkaya_pravda_policy
						maritime_law = protect_trade_routes
						piracy_law = anti_piracy_policy
						distribution_of_power_law = dop_traditional_distribution_of_power
					}
				}

				tolerated_cultures = {
					ingrian
					muscovite
					pomor
					karelian
					vepsian
					bjarmian
					sapmi
				}

				include = "expl_india_hindu"
				include = "india_limited_monarchy"
				capital = pal_lahara
				government = {
					ruler = random

				add_pops_from_locations = {

					cuencame alamamas  irritila
				}

				include = "expl_mesoamerica"

					ruler_term = {	 character = csu_sinchi_ruqa start_date = 1230.1.1 end_date = 1260.1.1 regnal_number = 1	}
					ruler_term = {	 character = csu_lluqi_yupanki start_date = 1260.1.1 end_date = 1290.1.1 regnal_number = 1	}
					ruler_term = {	 character = csu_mayta_qhapaq start_date = 1290.1.1 end_date = 1320.1.1 regnal_number = 1	}
					ruler_term = {	 character = csu_tarco_huaman start_date = 1320.1.1 end_date = 1320.6.1 regnal_number = 1	}
					ruler_term = {	 character = csu_qhapaq_yupanki start_date = 1320.6.1 regnal_number = 1	}

					regnal_numbers = {
						name_manco = 1
						name_sinchi = 1
						name_lluqi = 1
						name_mayta = 1
						name_tarco = 1
					}

					laws = {
						cultural_traditions_law = martial_society
					}
				}
				court_language = quechuan_language
				tolerated_cultures = {
					killke_culture
				}

				capital = qusqu
			}

					}

					centralization_vs_decentralization = 33

					belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -50
					quality_vs_quantity = 0
					offensive_vs_defensive = -10

						heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
						sharia_law = jafari_policy
					}

					}
				}

				}

				religious_school = jafari_school
				capital = tabriz
			}

					}

						marriage_law = monogamous_marriage
						heir_religion_law = heir_same_religion
					}
					centralization_vs_decentralization = 100
					aristocracy_vs_plutocracy = -60
					serfdom_vs_free_subjects = 20
					belligerent_vs_conciliatory = -40
					offensive_vs_defensive = 40
					land_vs_naval = -50
					outward_vs_inward = -40
				}
				country_rank = rank_empire
				court_language = persian_language
				capital = istakhr

					serfdom_vs_free_subjects = -40
					traditionalist_vs_innovative = 10
					spiritualist_vs_humanist = -50
					mercantilism_vs_free_trade = 50
					belligerent_vs_conciliatory = 20
					offensive_vs_defensive = 0
					land_vs_naval = 50
					quality_vs_quantity = 20
					capital_economy_vs_traditional_economy = 100
					individualism_vs_communalism = 20
					outward_vs_inward = 0

					laws = {
						sharia_law = ibadi_policy
					}
				}

				religious_school = ibadi_school

				capital = nizwa
			}

				}

				discovered_regions = {
					canada_region
					great_plains_region
					east_coast_region
				}

				include = "amerindian_tribe"
				include = "expl_mesoamerica"
				government = {
					ruler = random
				}
			}

			NGU = { # Nguni
				type = pop

				add_pops_from_locations = {
					umngazi dedesi mpondo ethekwini umhlanga ntshekane ukhahlamba buthelezi ndwandwe ngwane umgungundlovu
					ntsoana_tsatsi konde mthethwa swazi zombodze bokoni mapulana mbombela mashishing mghumbhani kaditshwene
				}

				discovered_areas = {
					umgungundlovu_area
					thaba_bosiu_area
					tzaneen_area
					limpopo_area
				}

				include = "subsaharan_tribe"
				government = {
					type = tribe
					heir_selection = tribal_oldest_male
					ruler = random
				}
			}
